entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 3:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Temperature: -10.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.4°C
Wind: ENE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow or freezing rain beginning early this evening. Fog patches. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain ending near noon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 27 December 2022
